OUR PROCESS

Circle is a boutique agency that combines international credentials and local intelligence. We are a full service agency with high end technical talent, world-class designers and top of the pile digital strategists. Our development teams work in lean groups using Agile methodology. Our advertising associates are the Google Certified and produce magic money-making targetting at the click of a mouse. Our design team is data-driven at its core but isn't above a bit of whimsy.

THINGS WE DO
User experience & aesthetic design for web and apps
Large technical web builds
Mobile application design and build
Digital ad buying, strategy and targeting
E-commerce strategy, design and build
